title: Courtyard and mountain views, Resident social lounge, Courtesy patrol
posting_body: Your search for the perfect new apartment in North Las Vegas is over.
As one of the premier apartment communities, Sedona at Lone Mountain is an ideal place to call home.
Offering spacious one, two and three-bedroom apartments, our pet-friendly community has everything you need for a lavish and comfortable lifestyle.

Ceiling fans in dining room and bedrooms-Oversized walk-in closets                                                                                                                                Select units                                                                                                                                Featured amenity-Air conditioning with programmable thermostat-Separate dining area-Fireplaces available-Vaulted ceilings-Private balcony or patio-Courtyard and mountain views-In-home washer and dryer                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Featured amenity

State-of-the-art fitness center-Onsite playground-Controlled-entry access with ample parking                                                                                         Featured amenity-Co-working lounge with complimentary Wi-Fi-Professional onsite management-Courtesy patrol-Spin classes available-Relaxing resort-style pool                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity-Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)-Landscaped courtyard with outdoor seating
